                        while (top >= 0) {

                            nodes++;
                            edges += deg[u];
                            for (int e = head[u]; e != -1; e = next[e]) {

                                if (!visited[v]) {
                                    visited[v] = 1;
                                    stack[++top] = v;
                                }
                            }
                        }

                        if (nodes > 1 && (nodes % 2 == 1) && (2 * nodes == edges)) {
                            total_ans++;
                        }
                    }
                }

                if ((n - total_ans) % 2 == 1) {
                    total_ans++;
                }

                if (count == 0) {
                    first_ans = total_ans;
                }
                count++;

                // Free memory
                free(head);
                free(next);
                free(to);
                free(deg);
                free(visited);
                free(stack);
            }

            if (count > 0) {
                // The second program: print the digit at index first_ans-1
                printf("%d\n", digits[first_ans-1]);
            }

            return 0;
